name: Self-employed scientists and engineers, by education, occupation, and type of business: 2019
description: Self-employed scientists and engineers, by education, occupation, and type of business: 2019

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_unincorporated_business_professional_practice_or_farm
variableMeasured.description: Unincorporated Business Professional Practice Or Farm

variableMeasured.name: field_incorporated_business_professional_practice_or_farm
variableMeasured.description: Incorporated Business Professional Practice Or Farm

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Scientists and engineers include those with one or more S&E or S&E-related degrees at the bachelor's level or higher or those who have only a non-S&E degree at the bachelor's level or higher and are employed in an S&E or S&E-related occupation. Detail may not add to total because of rounding.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, National Survey of College Graduates (NSCG), 2019.Science and Engineering Indicators
